name: The Mansion (itch) (mattpor)
description:
Oh Covid...

I've had too much time on my hands so I wrote yet another text adventure.  This one is a haunted mansion.  I've debugged it as far as I can take it.  Seems to run well-tuned, so I'm releasing it.  If you like the old school text-adventures (Zork-like) then you may enjoy this.
